mapper.select: select id, subscription_id, subscribe_type, subscribe_content, operator_id, operation_time, remark from ly_mw_warning_subscription_content where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ly_mw_warning_subscription_content(subscription_id, subscribe_type, subscribe_content, operator_id, operation_time, remark) values (#{subscriptionId}, #{subscribeType}, #{subscribeContent}, #{operatorId}, #{operationTime}, #{remark})

insert into ly_mw_warning_subscription_content(subscription_id, subscribe_type, subscribe_content, operator_id, operation_time, remark) values
(#{entity.subscriptionId}, #{entity.subscribeType}, #{entity.subscribeContent}, #{entity.operatorId}, #{entity.operationTime}, #{entity.remark})

insert into ly_mw_warning_subscription_content(subscription_id, subscribe_type, subscribe_content, operator_id, operation_time, remark) values
(#{entity.subscriptionId}, #{entity.subscribeType}, #{entity.subscribeContent}, #{entity.operatorId}, #{entity.operationTime}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update subscription_id = values(subscription_id), subscribe_type = values(subscribe_type), subscribe_content = values(subscribe_content), operator_id = values(operator_id), operation_time = values(operation_time), remark = values(remark)
mapper.update:
update ly_mw_warning_subscription_content
subscription_id = #{subscriptionId},
subscribe_type = #{subscribeType},
subscribe_content = #{subscribeContent},
operator_id = #{operatorId},
operation_time = #{operationTime},
remark = #{remark},
where id = #{id}
